author: zaph3
comment: Oh, if only. . .  You can only access the controls in portrait mode.  Simple enough for a phone or tablet, albeit a bit tedious.  However, this means I have to rotate my CAR or AndroidTV to hit pause?  My car doesn't have an autorotate mode, nor does my AndroidTV.  A couple simple changes and this would be my goto player.  I love the simple interface.  Fits my old school personality well.

author: Mike Smith
comment: I wanted an app that could play all my music files in a playlist so as not having to choose each one individually. Unfortunately this app plays all my 4.3 ratio videos in 16.9 and makes them look ridiculous. A very basic player and having to keep turning the phone into portrait mode to access the controls is absolutely ridiculous ... uninstalled.
title: Plays wrong aspect ratio

comment: PROS: Tiny, folder based, multi-format, simple, intuitive. CONS: No external subtitle support. Working perfectly on Pure Nexus 6.0.1 on bullhead and grouper but not flo, (bizarre!).

reply.author: Aaron Turner
reply.content: I'm happy to hear the app is working so well for you! And, yes my main goal was functionality, so I'm glad to hear you enjoy it! I am sad to hear you don't like the look of it, if you have a better idea, I'd love to hear your feedback on what you would like to see in a music app! just check out the customer support email in the description!

title: My Default Local Media Player

author: Neilor Holanda
comment: Didn't work for zero USB phone.

reply.author: Aaron Turner
reply.content: Uploading a new update to fix this right now! sorry for the inconvenience. I hope to get some more stars from you once you see the update! :)

author: A.J. Stevens
comment: I was sick of the bloated media players for Android like MX Player and VLC so I snagged Feather up enthusiastically thinking I fully understood the concept of a file manager based media player. Wow was I wrong this app does not even identify itself to Android that it handles media files so if you want to open media from an external app forget about it you have to drudge thru your filesystem. Thank goodness for the two hour Google Play Refund Policy! On the plus side the interface is pretty.

reply.author: Aaron Turner
reply.content: I am quite sorry that is wasn't working for you to open from other apps! If I may ask, which version were you using? As I am certain I fixed this in version 4.0 . And what app were you using? You can contact me at my contact e-mail on the app page, but thank you for at least trying out the app!
